snippet: After the second deadliest mass shooting in the country’s history, Americans find themselves debating access to guns, security practices and mental health issues.
abstract: Newtown, Conn, joins places like Littleton, Colo, and Jonesboro, Ark, where schools became the scenes of stunning violence; gun control, school security and mental health issues become once again a focus of the nation details emerge from the massacre at Sandy Hook Elementary School.
lead_paragraph: After the second deadliest mass shooting in the country’s history, Americans find themselves debating access to guns, security practices and mental health issues.

headline.seo: Sandy Hook Forces Re-examination of Tough Questions
headline.main: Nation’s Pain Is Renewed, and Difficult Questions Are Asked Once More
